Literature.Title: Surface-active fungicidal D-peptide inhibitors of the plasma membrane proton pump that block azole resistance.
Literature.Author: Monk BC, Niimi K, Lin S, Knight A, Kardos TB, Cannon RD, Parshot R, King A, Lun D, Harding DR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Saccharomyces cerevisiae T48(MIC90=1.9µM),Candida albicans FR2(MIC90=31µM),Candida glabrata CBS 138(MIC90=15µM),Candida tropicalis IFO 0618(MIC90=7.7µM)
